name: Mordheim: City of the Damned - HIRED SWORDS DLC BUNDLE 1 - Poison Wind Globadier + Smuggler
name_original: Mordheim: City of the Damned - HIRED SWORDS DLC BUNDLE 1 - Poison Wind Globadier + Smuggler
description:
This bundle includes the 2 DLCs "Mordheim: City of the Damned - The Poison Wind Globadier" and "Mordheim: City of the Damned - The Smuggler"


POISON WIND GLOBADIER This Hired Sword is a new Hero-type unit that can be recruited to further customize your roster. The Poison Wind Globadier is available for the Skaven and the Cult of the Possessed Warbands.

SMUGGLER This Hired Sword is a new Hero-type unit that can be recruited to further customize your roster. The Smuggler is available for the Mercenaries and the Sisters of Sigmar Warbands.
